sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'
import { icons } from '../../../../icons/icons'
import styled from 'styled-components'

const css = require('./MediaIcons.module.css')

const Wrapper = styled.div<{ horizontal: boolean }>`
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  flex-flow: ${props => props.horizontal ? 'row' : 'column' };
`

const LinkWrapper = styled.a<{ horizontal: boolean }>`


`

type TMediaIconsProps = {
  horizontal?: boolean
  vertical?: boolean
}

const MediaIcons: React.FunctionComponent<TMediaIconsProps> = (props): JSX.Element => {
  const { horizontal = true, vertical}: TMediaIconsProps = props

  const containerStyles = [
    css.Icons,
    horizontal && css.horizontal,
    vertical && css.vertical,
  ].join(' ')

  const iconStyles = [
    css.Icon,
    horizontal && css.horizontal,
    vertical && css.vertical,
  ].join(' ')

  return (
    <Wrapper horizontal={horizontal}>
      <LinkWrapper horizontal={horizontal} href='https://github.com/joonajo' aria-label="github-link" className={iconStyles} target='_blank' rel="noopener noreferrer">
        <FontAwesomeIcon icon={icons.faGithub} />
      </LinkWrapper>
      <LinkWrapper horizontal={horizontal} href='mailto: joona.joenpolvi@gmail.com' aria-label="email-link" className={iconStyles}>
        <FontAwesomeIcon icon={icons.faEnvelope} />
      </LinkWrapper>
      <LinkWrapper horizontal={horizontal} href="https://instagram.com/joonajo" aria-label="ig-link" className={iconStyles} target='_blank' rel="noopener noreferrer">
        <FontAwesomeIcon icon={icons.faInstagram} />
      </LinkWrapper>
      <LinkWrapper horizontal={horizontal} href="https://www.flickr.com/photos/150620060@N07/" aria-label="flickr-link" className={iconStyles} target='_blank' rel="noopener noreferrer">
        <FontAwesomeIcon icon={icons.faFlickr} />
      </LinkWrapper>
    </Wrapper>
  )
}

export default MediaIcons
